register.description: this is a test service for ElasTest Device Emulator Service

costs.description: On Demand 5 per deployment, 50 per core, 10 per GB ram and 1 per GB disk
costs.name: On Demand 5 + Charges

manifest.manifest_content: version: '2'</br></br>services:</br>  eds-frontend:</br>   eds-memsipe:</br>  eds-zigbeeipe:</br>    image: elastest/eds-frontend</br>  image: elastest/eds-memsipe</br>    image: elastest/eds-zigbeeipe</br>  container_name: zigbeeipe</br> container_name: memsipe</br> container_name: frontend</br> container_name: api</br> ports:</br> - 8080:8080</br> - 6065:6065</br></br>
